paper_title.ja: ステップごとの解説の作成と相互評価をとり入れた問題づくり授業（共著）
paper_title.en: Problem-Posing with Making Step-by-Step Explanations and Peer Evaluation

description.ja: Problem-posing is intended for students to improve their understanding of learning materials and to encourage their active participation in class. We propose a new problem-posing that adds the following two phases to the traditional one. (1) Students describe the explanations of the solving methods when they create problems. (2) Students check the created problems and explanations with each other. These two phases make the students confirm the solving methods of the problems and improve their understanding. We carried out experiments with problem-posing on math lessons dealing with linear equations at a junior high school and a cram school. The results show that the proposed problem-posing was well accepted by the students.
description.en: Problem-posing is intended for students to improve their understanding of learning materials and to encourage their active participation in class. We propose a new problem-posing that adds the following two phases to the traditional one. (1) Students describe the explanations of the solving methods when they create problems. (2) Students check the created problems and explanations with each other. These two phases make the students confirm the solving methods of the problems and improve their understanding. We carried out experiments with problem-posing on math lessons dealing with linear equations at a junior high school and a cram school. The results show that the proposed problem-posing was well accepted by the students.

paper_title.ja: 形成的テストにおけるフィードバックを円滑に機能させる多肢選択問題の出題方式（共著）
paper_title.en: A Practical Method of Multiple−Choice Questions in Formative Tests

description.ja: 形成的評価を行うための方法のひとつに形成的テストがある。形成的テストの目的は，学習者が間違って理解している点・理解が不十分な点を早期に見つけ，学習者の理解を修正・改善するためのフィードバックを行うことである。形成的テストにおいてこのフィードバックが円滑に機能するためには，学習者による誤答問題の見直しが重要である。見直しについては学習者のモチベーションに委ねられているが，自発的に見直しを行う学習者の数は少ない。本研究では，多肢選択問題を対象として，自信をもって解答できない場合は無理に解答を求めないことにより，誤答問題の自発的な見直しを促すというアイデアに基づいた形成的テストの出題方式を提案する。また，このアイデアに基づく形成的テストシステムを作成し，提案する出題方式の有効性の確認を行った。
description.en: The purpose of formative tests is to provide feedback to learners in order to improve their comprehension. To improve the comprehension, the learners should review the questions that they could not make correct answers according to teachers' advice. However, only a few learners conduct reviews on their own initiative. We propose a practical method of multiple−choice questions in formative tests in order to promote learners' voluntary reviews based on the idea that learners should not be forced to answer if they do not have confidence to their answers.
